page.title: 02 INTRODUCTION
page.content:
This first page is an introduction to the area we know today as{Fulstow.
Fulstow is a small village some 8 miles to the north of the market town of Louth,with a population of roughly 500.The people of the village mainly work on or around farms.Most of the { land is covered by crops and grazing pasture.We have a pig farm,an egg farm and many other{farms}in and about the village.It is a fairly quiet village and although we are quite close to the sea it isn't a seaside holiday resort. People come from the surrounding area to use the new village hall and other {leisure}activities,yet many villagers travel to Grimsby, or Louth, both to work and for their leisure. Many people have moved into this area from large towns because it is a most peaceful and pretty village.
